name: Rock Zombie
overview: Rock Zombie is a 3D brawler fighting game with female rock band members as the main heroines. The player can choose from three characters: Zoe, Sasha and Crystal. They fight against zombies after a rock concert. The story is presented through comic-like cut-scenes. The player controls the selected heroine and fights many types of zombies such as normal, crawling and vomiting zombies as well as dogs. They also need to avoids traps and collects coins. Each heroine has a guitar as the main weapon and can use several magic spells. The game has 20 levels and a hard rock/metal soundtrack. While the fighting sections are played from a side-scrolling side view, there are also driving levels where they ride a bike shown from a behind view.
